lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.model

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.model.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Server that allows access to the server without using an actor. Should only be used if the actor is not required like getting data, but not modifying it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.rmi.registry.Registry _registry
      The _registry, which allows server lookup.
      private static Server singleton
      The singleton of the server type, enforces that only one version of this class can be created.

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiates a new server.

      • registryLookup

                                        java.rmi.RemoteException
        Registry lookup.
        Parameters:
        objectName - the object name
        Returns:
        the object
        Throws:
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Thrown if the server has not been bound correctly in RMI settings
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline

      • env

        public IcrashEnvironment env()
                      throws java.rmi.NotBoundException,
                             java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the server environment and all of it's associated remote methods
        Returns:
        the iCrash environment retrieved from the server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Thrown if the server has not been bound correctly in RMI settings
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline
